title: Mad.Max.w.Update0.v2-3DMGAME
description:
So, the previous 3dm release (v1) didn't work for me, but this v2 version seems to work perfectly.

I've tested it on win10 with different time zones (since denuvo) and both Pacific and Bejing seemed to work with English setting.

I didn't have to do anything, just double click the exe. It will give the 3dm popup, but then it should load after pressing the button. If you experience a problem, try moving the directory out of Program files to something like c:games or something that doesn't require admin permissions.

I wanted to share this because a lot of conflicting stuff is out there that doesn't work or only works for some people.

Anyway, all glory to 3dm.
I'd say this is a repack, but it wasn't packed in the first place. I took the preload files, decrypted them with the decrypter, added the v2 dlc/crack stuff and it just works...

I've split each rar file into 1.95GB chunks.
It uses rar5 format.

enjoy,
murph
